channel.title: Apple on Jack Olney
channel.description: Recent content in Apple on Jack Olney

item.title: Apple Pencil
item.description: Having just watched the latest Apple keynote, I have to admit at being quite impressed at the latest products. Even John Gruber got it wrong! After flat-out claiming there would be no iPadPro announcement, there we have it! But the internet seems rather pre-occupied by the smile issue, and the pencil. Regarding the smile, I couldn’t care less. Regarding the pencil, I kind of think is works. Or at least, it’s the right time for a stylus.
